frontmatter.title: Blockchain and smart contracts live teaching adventures
frontmatter.description: Last week I was invited by Blockchain Academy Mexico to give a workshop in Spanish for the Instituto Tecnológico de Monterrey. It was to teach smart contracs, with the title How to create your own token on the Ethereum Blockchain

frontmatter.title: My experience at EthDenver 2020
frontmatter.description: At EthDenver I decided to build something with a focus on State of Colorado challenges, using tools from IoV Labs: RIF to facilitate the decentralized storage in IPFS and Swarm, and smart contracts which can be published on both RSK and Ethereum networks. And… I won a bountie from the State of Colorado with my project!

frontmatter.title: Hello World
frontmatter.description: This is my Blockchain Developers Blog
